experiences.title: Student, Software Developer
experiences.subtitle: Bell Canada
workDescription: Initiated a Koalify(RDQ) plugin, a modularized project management web app, to support bulk JIRA ticket management through API, converting 6 hrs of manual work into 0.2 hrs of automation supporting 1750 hrs over 300 devices/year.

Developed Devium, an in-house automated testing platform, validates network functionalities of maintenance releases or OS upgrades on wireless technology products so that product owners can issue technical approvals.

experiences.title: Web Developer

workDescription: Designed a WordPress website with features of hair service booking management, payment/deposit, and Google Calendar sync, providing a streamlined booking process with 24/7 accessibility.
Administered a website for 2+ years as it grew to 250+ appointments and sales averaging $50,000+ monthly.
